DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to set up a model for detecting micrometastases in Lymph nodes of patients with prostate cancer by quantitative polymerase chain reaction and its impact on progression-free survival.
DOC.brief_title: Detection of Micrometastases in Lymph Nodes of Patients With Prostate Cancer
